Use this for have Tools Bulk Sender and Chatbot (no oficial), the best WhatsApp no official Marketing Software and Automation Tool, to connect with your customers by sending bulk messages without saving their numbers.

Without keep whatsapp web online, 24/7 chatbot join in :
https://wasubot.com


Maximize your business growth on WhatsApp with Whatsapp no official  Tools Bulk Sender and Chatbot.

Key Features:
‚Ä¢ Free WhatsApp Auto Message sender
‚Ä¢ Google Chrome extension based on WhatsApp Web
‚Ä¢ Send automated, customized, and bulk messages
‚Ä¢ Upload a list of WhatsApp numbers in an Excel file
‚Ä¢ Download a demo Excel file of WhatsApp numbers
‚Ä¢ Save message text as a template
‚Ä¢ Send attachments in bulk
‚Ä¢ Offer an unsubscribe option
‚Ä¢ Personalize messages with placeholders
‚Ä¢ Set random send intervals for bulk messages
‚Ä¢ Safe interval for group messaging
‚Ä¢ Export selected group members
‚Ä¢ Real-time progress tracking
‚Ä¢ Export sending results
‚Ä¢ Option to stop bulk sending at any time
‚Ä¢ Send bulk WhatsApp contact cards
‚Ä¢ Chatbot and autoresponder

Whatsapp Tools Bulk Sender and Chatbot is the ultimate solution for bulk WhatsApp messaging, with premium features like Web Sender, Direct Message, Self Sender, and more. Easily send messages to all your contacts, even those not saved in your address book, with a single click. Try Whatsapp Tools Bulk Sender and Chatbot web features for free and start saving time now!

Note: Spamming on WhatsApp is strictly prohibited and goes against their terms of service.

WhatsApp is a registered trademark of WhatsApp Inc. Whatsapp Tools Bulk Sender and Chatbot is an independent project and has no affiliation with WhatsApp or WhatsApp Inc.
long.am,bg,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,hi:
Optimize Your WhatsApp Communication with Our Advanced Tool

Revolutionize Your WhatsApp Experience: Introducing Our New Bot, Autoresponder, and More!

Unlock the full potential of WhatsApp communication without the need to keep WhatsApp Web active round-the-clock. Experience the efficiency of a 24/7 chatbot at your fingertips. Get started here: https://wasubot.com

Elevate Your Messaging with Emojis üéâ
Dive into our latest version, now enriched with a wide array of expressive emojis! Engage in more vibrant and lively conversations that truly stand out.

Key Features:

Automated WhatsApp Messaging: Streamline your communication with our sophisticated chatbot and auto-response capabilities.
Effortless Bulk Messaging: Send queued messages and attachments seamlessly to multiple recipients.
Enhanced Contact Management: Export WhatsApp contacts effortlessly, filter non-WhatsApp numbers, and manage your contact list with ease.
Emoji Integration: Enhance your messages with one-click emojis, adding a touch of personality to every conversation.
No Need to Save Numbers: Initiate conversations without having to save contacts on your device.
Global Connectivity: Connect with customers worldwide with our tool's universal compatibility.
Excel Integration: Simplify your workflow with easy Excel sheet integration for your contacts.
User-Friendly Interface: Navigate through the tool with ease, thanks to its simple and intuitive design.
Customizable Messaging: Personalize your messages with text formatting, name customization, and the ability to send images and PDF attachments.
Privacy Respect: Provide your contacts with an unsubscribe option, ensuring their comfort and privacy.
Comprehensive Contact Downloads: Effortlessly download both saved and unsaved contacts from various sources, including groups and broadcast lists.
Disclaimer:
This Chrome extension is designed to enhance your WhatsApp Web experience and is not affiliated with or endorsed by WhatsApp Inc. It's the ultimate tool for optimizing your WhatsApp interactions but is not intended for spamming. Misuse for spamming may lead to WhatsApp banning your number.

Elevate your WhatsApp interactions today. Try our tool and experience seamless communication like never before.
